Thanks for the reply. I thought it might be the case.

By the way, is there=
 a full documentation for the Heritrix's configuration? For example, I want=
 to time-limit each domain. Meaning, the crawler shoudl download example.co=
m for 10 minutes and 4-depth and move on to the next one.

Thanks again for=
 your help.

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Keith Enlow <kenlow@..=
.> wrote:
>
> To answer your first question about the WUI and why it looks =
different.

?
> Heritrix 3 no longer contains those tabs and such and has been implemen=
ted

he
> Heritrix 3 WUI read  this:
